explains: vt. 诬蔑；玷污；给……打上烙印

sentences.en: They both ratify and stigmatize certain behaviors.
sentences.cn: 他们都批准和诬蔑某些行为。

sentences.en: We stigmatize dependence. Our society is avoidant, in a way.
sentences.cn: 我们经常贬低“依赖”，某种意义上，我们的社会就是逃避型的。

sentences.en: IQ testing can stigmatize a child permanently, causing more harm than good, Das said.
sentences.cn: 智商测试给一个孩子永远地打上一个烙印，导致的坏处多于好处。
